translations: n.胁腹；（军队或球队的）翼侧，侧面；（大型物体的）一侧，一边
v.侧面有；位于……的两侧；侧攻
【名】 （Flank）（法）弗朗克，（瑞典、匈）弗兰克（人名）

sentences.sentence: They continued along the flank of the mountain.
sentences.translation: 他们沿着山的侧面继续前进。

sentences.sentence: He put his hand on the dog's flank.
sentences.translation: 他把手放在狗的胁腹上。

sentences.sentence: The assault element, led by Captain Ramirez, opened up from their right flank.
sentences.translation: 拉米雷斯上尉率领的突击队从他们的右翼开火。
